pages.title: Launch Systems
pages.text: Different rockets require different launch systems. Using the correct launch platform is crucial for a successful takeoff.$(br2)AstroExpansion provides two main launch systems: Launch Rails and Landing Pads.

pages.title: Launch Rail
pages.text: A simple launch system designed exclusively for $(thing)Probe Rockets$().$(br2)To use: Place the Launch Rail, right-click with a Probe Rocket to place it on the rail, then right-click the rail again to launch the probe.

pages.title: Landing Pad
pages.text: A versatile platform for $(thing)Personal Rockets$() and $(thing)Cargo Shuttles$().$(br2)For Personal Rockets: Requires a single block.$(br)For Cargo Shuttles: Must be arranged in a 3x3 pattern.

pages.title: Launch Procedure
pages.text: 1. Place the appropriate launch system$(br)2. Right-click with your rocket to place it$(br)3. For Probe Rockets: Right-click the launch rail$(br)4. For Personal Rockets: Right-click to board, then hold SPACE to launch$(br)5. For Cargo Shuttles: Enter the GUI and press Launch when fueled$(br2)$(warning)Always wear a space suit before launching player-carrying rockets!
